name: Trick or Trip
description:
A strange game for adults whohave refused to grow up. Missed out on trick or treating last year? Don't worry, we've "cooked up" just what you need!

As we do not have a way of explaining the story because of time, here is a simple guide:

WASD for movement

1,2,3 for abilities. basic attacks with m1.

charge your energy to use abilities by basic attacking.

Move through the map or maybe visit the haunted house? What will you decide to do?
